languages.text: "Ласераксы опасны, почти не спят и обладают скверным нравом. Кого-то мне это напоминает... Буду звать ее Равора".
"Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."
languages.original_text: "Ласераксы опасны, почти не спят и обладают скверным нравом. Кого-то мне это напоминает... Буду звать ее Равора".

traits.locale_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

"Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

languages.text: “异虎是非常危险的家伙。它们几乎从来不睡觉，而且脾气特别暴躁，这让我想起了某个人……就叫她‘雷沃拉’吧。”
languages.original_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

traits.locale_text: “异虎是非常危险的家伙。它们几乎从来不睡觉，而且脾气特别暴躁，这让我想起了某个人……就叫她‘雷沃拉’吧。”

languages.text: 「レースラックスは危険で、しかもほとんど眠らずに気性も荒い。ある人のことを思い出す…彼女はラヴォアと呼ぼう」
languages.original_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

traits.locale_text: 「レースラックスは危険で、しかもほとんど眠らずに気性も荒い。ある人のことを思い出す…彼女はラヴォアと呼ぼう」

languages.text: «Un lacerax es una bestia peligrosa que apenas duerme y tiene muy mal genio. Me recuerda a alguien... Se llamará Ravora».
languages.original_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

traits.locale_text: «Un lacerax es una bestia peligrosa que apenas duerme y tiene muy mal genio. Me recuerda a alguien... Se llamará Ravora».

languages.text: « Les lacérax sont dangereux, ils ne dorment jamais et ils ont un caractère affreux. Voilà qui me rappelle quelqu'un... Je vais la baptiser "Ravora". »
languages.original_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

traits.locale_text: « Les lacérax sont dangereux, ils ne dorment jamais et ils ont un caractère affreux. Voilà qui me rappelle quelqu'un... Je vais la baptiser "Ravora". »

languages.text: "Laceraxe sind gefährlich, brauchen kaum Schlaf und sind übel gelaunt. Das erinnert mich an jemanden ... Ich nenne sie Ravora."
languages.original_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

traits.locale_text: "Laceraxe sind gefährlich, brauchen kaum Schlaf und sind übel gelaunt. Das erinnert mich an jemanden ... Ich nenne sie Ravora."

languages.text: "Laserakslar tehlikelidir, neredeyse hiç uyumazlar ve fazlasıyla öfkelidirler. Bunlar bana birini hatırlatıyor. Ona Ravora diyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Laceraxes are dangerous, they hardly sleep, and they have a nasty temper. That reminds me of someone... I'll call her Ravora."

traits.locale_text: "Laserakslar tehlikelidir, neredeyse hiç uyumazlar ve fazlasıyla öfkelidirler. Bunlar bana birini hatırlatıyor. Ona Ravora diyeceğim."
